org.spacetimeresearch.gwt.addthis.client
Class AddThisWidget

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.UIObject
      com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Widget
          org.spacetimeresearch.gwt.addthis.client.AddThisWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasHandlers, EventListener
public class AddThisWidget
extends Widget

AddThisWidget. A GWT Widget that wraps AddThis javaScript to create a GWT button version.

Created: Dec 18, 2009 License: Apache License, Version 2.0

Since:
Author:
Ben Hudson, Brendan Sebire & Karl Ots Space-Time Research Pty Ltd http://www.spacetimeresearch.com
